org.ietf.nea.pt.socket.sasl

Class PlainClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ietf.nea.pt.socket.sasl.PlainClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SaslClient

    public final class PlainClient
extends Object
implements SaslClient
    Implements the PLAIN SASL client-side mechanism. (RFC 4616) It processes a name callback for the authentication ID and a password callback for the associated password.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      • PlainClient

        public PlainClient(CallbackHandler callbackHandler)
            throws SaslException
        Constructs a Plain mechanism without authorization ID.
        Parameters:
        callbackHandler - the callback handler to use
        Throws:
        SaslException - if callback handler is null

      • PlainClient

        public PlainClient(String authorizationId,
           CallbackHandler callbackHandler)
            throws SaslException
        Constructs a Plain mechanism with optional authorization ID.
        Parameters:
        authorizationId - If non-null, used to specify authorization ID
        callbackHandler - the callback handler to use
        Throws:
        SaslException - if callback handler is null

        private byte[] createResponse(String authenticationID,
                    char[] password)
                       throws SaslException
        Creates a response with the given authentication ID and password.
        Parameters:
        authenticationID - the ID to use for authentication
        password - the password to authenticate the authentication ID
        Returns:
        the response in raw bytes
        Throws:
        SaslException - if byte encoding fails
